value.title: AI fighter pilot vs. Air Force pilot: Dogfight showdown scheduled for this week
value.excerpt: DARPA is conducting its third AlphaDogfight Trials. The winning AI will be pitted against a human pilot in a human vs. algorithm aerial showdown.

value.title: Researchers use AI to combat and quantify browser fingerprinting
value.excerpt: To combat fingerprinting in particular, in a recent study, researchers at The University of Iowa, Mozilla, and the University of California, Davis investigated a machine learning-based approach called FP-Inspector that trains classifiers to learn fingerprinting.

value.title: Intel: Data bandwidth, sparsity are the two biggest challenges for AI chips
value.excerpt: The movement of data into and out of the processor is the biggest challenge for AI chips, but sparsity looms as an even greater challenge, according to Intel engineers.

value.title: AI-enabled future crimes ranked: Deepfakes, spearphishing, and more
value.excerpt: A study explores the possible range and risk of attacks from military robots and autonomous attack drones to AI-assisted stalking. Here are the top 5.

value.title: MIT's shared ebike transforms into a self-driving trike

value.title: Google claims TensorFlow’s OpenCL can double inference performance
value.excerpt: Google has adopted an OpenCL-based inference backened for TensorFlow on mobile devices, which the company claims delivers a significant speedup.

value.title: Hour One raises $5M Seed to generate AI-driven synthetic characters from real humans

value.title: Artificial Intelligence: Breakthrough could ‘allow AI to merge with human brain’
value.excerpt: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) experts believe the discovery of a cutting-edge material could finally achieve ambitions of fusing the human brain with machines.

value.title: British police to trial facial recognition system that detects your mood
value.excerpt: Lincolnshire police plan to test facial recognition and behavioral tech that infers people's moods and expressions by analyzing CCTV footage.

value.title: 'Microsoft Flight Simulator' is finally back and the reviews are in
value.excerpt: Its latest iteration goes back to the original naming convention of " Microsoft Flight Simulator ," but pretty much everything else about it is shiny and new. The 2020 edition – which is also the first new one since 2014 – gives virtual pilots access to a full planet's worth of skyways.

value.title: Hearing Sensation can Markedly Improve the Perception of Robots

value.title: The meatpacking industry is an incubator for AI, automation, and COVID-19
value.excerpt: As the pandemic stretches on, the threat to meatpacking, meat processing, and distribution center employees has researchers seeking a new production model.

value.title: How robotics and automation could create new jobs in the new normal
value.excerpt: The COVID-19 crisis could accelerate a robotics revolution and impact jobs -- but it's not necessarily all bad news for workers.

value.title: Photonics startup Lightmatter details P1, its AI optical accelerator chip
value.excerpt: Ahead of the Hot Chips 2020 conference this week, photonics chip startup Lightmatter detailed its forthcoming P1 accelerator hardware.

value.title: IBM unveils its first seven-nanometre chip for next-generation hybrid cloud computing
value.excerpt: IBM has announced the tenth generation of its flagship Power processors, a smaller, faster, more energy-efficient seven-nanometre chip that businesses can expect to deploy inside their data centres in the second half of 2021.

value.title: How to legally fight COVID-19 with AI
value.excerpt: Tonya Hall sits down with Hon. Katherine B. Forrest (Fmr.), partner at Cravath, Swaine & Moore, to learn more about how individuals can protect their 1st, 4th, and 5th Amendment rights while combating COVID-19.

value.title: Colgate's latest AI-powered smart toothbrush starts at $50
value.excerpt: Smart toothbrushes have been around for a few years now, but they haven’t quite caught on. Colgate, however, has come up with a potential alternative. The rechargeable model is $69.99, while the one with replaceable batteries is only $49.

value.title: How Can Data Quality Enhance Trust In Artificial Intelligence?
value.excerpt: As organizations rely more and more on AI, we will see an increase in trust as more regulations ask businesses to identify the source of any data and create transparent and explainable algorithms.

value.title: Elon Musk hints at Tesla’s not-so-secret Dojo AI-training supercomputer capacity
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has made a rare new comment about Tesla’s now not-so-secret ‘Dojo’ program to create an AI-training supercomputer and gave a hint of its capacity. value.title: DBS Bank looks to train 3,000 employees in AI with AWS partnership
